title.#text: Draft Genome Sequence of the Nylon Oligomer-Degrading Bacterium  sp. Strain KI72.

abstract: {'i': 'Arthrobacter', '#text': 'We report here the 4.6-Mb genome sequence of a nylon oligomer-degrading bacterium,  sp. strain KI72. The draft genome sequence of strain KI72 consists of 4,568,574\xa0bp, with a G+C content of 63.47%, 4,372 coding sequences (CDSs), 54 tRNAs, and six rRNAs.'}
